content: @Lloyd McKenzie , @Joshua Procious , @Chris Moesel posted this topic in the CQL stream: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179220-cql/topic/Jira.20doesn't.20allow.20CQL.20URLs, is there something I didn't set in the setup for the CQL project?
Jira has now been updated so that the URL will have to have either the official release URL or the CI-build URL as the root for the specific specification the comment is against.
Note that old issues that had an improper URL may now yell - if you run into something you can't fix, holler and one of the admins should be able to adjust it
